about_container.title: About Us
about_container.intro: At Clothy, we believe fashion is not just clothes. It is a way of expressing who we are, imagining the world as we want it to be, and connecting with others. With this dream at heart, we founded Clothy: a platform born to redesign the future of fashion, making it more accessible, inclusive, and sustainable for everyone.
about_container.history: It all started with a simple question: *“How can we help people find clothing that truly fits their vision and style?”*. Inspired by how quickly technology is changing the world, we decided to combine artificial intelligence with human creativity to build a unique tool: one that allows users to find clothing based on images in an intuitive and personalized way.
about_container.vision: Our mission goes beyond style or comfort. At Clothy, we dream of a future where fashion is a reflection of the change we want to see in the world: a more sustainable, inclusive, and connected future. We aim to offer users the tools to find clothing that not only represents them but also respects the planet.
about_container.commitment: Our users are at the center of everything we do. Every feature, every decision, and every improvement is designed to provide an experience that meets their needs and exceeds their expectations. Through your feedback and suggestions, we are committed to evolving and building a platform that truly makes a difference.
about_container.future: This is just the beginning. Our long-term vision includes projects such as creating a more sustainable fashion search engine, integration with local brands, and even tools that help reduce overconsumption in the clothing industry. All of this with one goal: to help you find your style while helping the world find its balance.
about_container.thanks: Thank you for being part of this journey. With Clothy, we are redefining fashion, together.

contact_container.title: Contact Us
contact_container.description: At Clothy, we love hearing your ideas, solving your doubts, and learning about your experiences. Communication is the key to building a more connected and accessible world. If you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hi, don't hesitate to contact us!
